values:
ok, so ive decided that im starting over.
im getting a new journal. this one is over. chapter completed. im moving on with my life, and not that i want to leave this portion behind, but im letting go. the past 19 years of my life have been wonderful. full of trials and tribulations and along the way awesome friends and backstabbers...
this isnt about vitaly
this isnt about adam
this is about me moving foreward in my life and becoming who i am to be in this world. i want to fill it with everything in from the coming years. im tired of living in the shadows. im breaking out.

journal, you have been a companion to me for a looong time. im sorry to say that its time to say goodbye.

<center><lj user="sweet_pea_11"></center>

i will be adding all my friends back that i have on this journal. and i hope that you will add me back again.

lots of love, 
cara

its 5 am. i feel like im back up at state. and i cant sleep. its a good thing that i dont have to be up for anything. i feel like shit. im having issues at the moment. and i dont know how to get rid of them. i dont want to have to see any less of him, but at the same time i dont see how im gonna get unattatched from him, if we dont. its a sad thing whats happening. im completely miserable when im not with him, i feel like my heart breaks each time... i figured that maybe typing up what im feeling in here might help me a little, so far no good. i dont know exactly what im feeling, but i know its not a good feeling...right now is what i mean, not all the time. on wednesday i went to work cause i was feeling down and as soon as i saw him i started bawling, and i dont know why. i just missed him sooo much. and tonight after he left i was soooo crushed. i tried talking to him but neither of us know what to do. neither of us want to spend less time w/ each other. but i need to feel ok when im not with him. im kinda starting to think that this is why ive been so sick lately... cause i always get sick when im not w/ him, except for that one time in the parking lot... i dont know what to do. i love him sooo much. and i know that he loves me, but its hard. ive never felt like this....like i wanted to just keal over and die when he leaves and just not be awake when im not with him. i just got physically sick like 10 min ago. i think to much...i know. i just want to be happy, and i am, but i hate being preoccupied with the thought of losing him, and he keeps telling me that its not going to happen. but ive almost lost him, twice...(nov and feb). and my heart was shattered to pieces each time and i was miserable.
::begins to sob...again::
I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO...
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
i feel so overwhelmed...what am i going to do tomorrow?? i wont get any homework done just cause i know that i wont. maybe my mom will take me shopping. ill prolly have to drive out to new hudson tho sometime tomorrow... i dont want to go out that way.
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
 im gonna try to go to sleep...i guess.

so ya today has been totally uneventful...
i woke up a lot during the night. not sure why...well the first time i had a nightmare. but the others not too sure...

so ive been laying in bed all day...havent done any homework, or eaten. i brushed my teeth and took a shower. i did however, ordered tickets to the BACKSTREET BOYS concert thats in April. yay for that! im going with colleen and michelle. double yay for that!

i talked to brandon today. its always nice to talk to him. hes really understanding, i miss hanging out with him/seeing him everyday. he tells it like it is, i love that you can always count on him to do that. i love you brandon, we'll talk again soon!

i talked to melissa today. i txt'd msg'd her while she was at work. we talked about her life and my life and compared, and shiznit like that. i miss talking to you too!

randomly, out of the blue, talked to chris today. he was at work, and decided that he was bored. so he IM'd me. and we chatted about how bored he was, lol.

i talked to aaaadam today, as always. nothing too new going on with us. DANIELLE I HAVE NEWS FOR YOU. im going over there later tonight, hopefully my headache will go away by then. i miss you too! :)


*this headache needs to go away....like now.

<center>You cannot quit me so quickly 
Is no hope in you for me 
No corner you could squeeze me 
But I've got all the time for you love 

The space between 
The tears we cry is the laughter that keeps us coming back for more 
The space between 
The wicked lies we tell to keep us safe from the pain 

Will I hold you again 
These fickle fuddled words confuse me 
Like will it rain today 
We waste the hours with talking talking 
These twisted games we're playing 
We're strange allies with warring hearts 
What a wild eyed beast you be 

Look at us spinning out in the madness of a rollercoaster 
You know you went off like the devil in the church 
In the middle of a crowded room 
All we can do my love 
Is hope we don't take this ship down 
The space between 
Where you smile and hide 
That's where you'll find me if I get to go 
The space between 
The bullets in our fire fight 
Is where I'll be hiding waiting for you 
The rain that falls splashed in your heart 
Ran like sadness down the window into your room 
The space between our wicked lies is 
The hope to keep safe from pain 
Take my hand cause we're walking out of here 
Right out of here is all we need dear 
The space between 
What's wrong and right 
Is where you'll find me hiding 
Waiting for you 
The space between 
Your heart and mind 
Is the space we'll fill with time</center>

i love this song

sooo 
i had a math test this morning...that went..... ok i guess
and then i had a bio lab which just stressed me out cause i hate bio

and now im home and i should be getting ready for work. joy!
i called the people that i bought my new head unit from to see when they were going to ship it out...well its on backorder...that would have been great to know when i ordered the damn thing instead of waiting a week. so they refunded my money, and i bought a different one from different people...its ok tho... cause this one is better. i was almost gonna buy the dual one cause it looks awesome (it has a TV and stuff on it, but ive never heard anything about dual.... so uh... no thanks. 

i have so much to do this weekend. lots-o-homework.

but ya. i should get going.
toodles!

so i downloaded a new program to play around with. its kinda like photoshop, but not. lol....so this is the product of the newness...

 

im upset....i cant believe i said what i said.

 

Before:

After:

you just gotta love going to work... and like 20 min in getting sexually harrassed by a customer. adam "yelled" at me cause i didnt tell mike about it. but ive never told anyone when shit like that happens. i told adam, and then steve walked in on our conversation...and steve got pretty upset about it, and he didnt even know what really happened. i just dont understand what mike would have done. anyways so i ended up crying at work... i dont know how im going to survive this semester... i starting thinking last night while watching mad about you. and i just got so upset over my parents and school. i just missed adam like crazy. so for the past like two or three days my mom has been in one of her little moods where she hates only me, and sets out to make my life miserable. and then this morning, i find a note on the counter that says: cara, could you pick up your sister from her post at 3:55 love, mom and then there is a huge smiley face underneath....shes only nice when she wants something, or when adam is around...im convinced. i have a bio quiz that i have to take today. im really not sure if i want to take it cause i only went to one of the classes that she lectured on. so i have no idea what we learned. i guess i should make up my mind cause i have to leave soon. hmm.... "ya know paul makes movies." "oh really? thats so funny. i work at a bank" i need a new job, or at least a second job... im exhausted. i need to get to sleep earlier from now on. screw spring break for getting me off my sleep schedule. {gah}

do you have any idea what it feels like to have a million people, that you dont know, hate you???




...i really dont think so.
{im not askig for anyone's forgiveness, especially from those that i dont know...
i.e. ryan, darren, bret, yasmin, courtney, troy (basically the whole wixom gfs store...yup..fuck you)
and im not asking for anyone's forgiveness, from the the people that i do know...
especially...jay, pat, amanda, edwin, (and probably a whole lot of others)} 
<center> personally i dont give a shit about these people</center>

and then there are those who i would love to ask forgiveness from, but i know that i will never get it...
i.e. you know who you are.




...school is overwhelming me, i think i may die...
i miss adam.

im getting a new screen name, comment if you would like to have it and then i will put yours on the new one.
if you dont comment, then ill prolly never speak to you thru AIM. 




this is all.

Three of Your Favorite Bands/Artists 1. incubus 2. metallica 3. godsmack Three of Your Favorite Songs at Present 1. lala - ashlee simpson 2. call on me - eric prydz 3. i fucking hate you - godsmack Three New Things You Want to Try 1. living on my own (with a friend) 2. not throwing up 3. a support group for eating disorders Three Things You Want in a Relationship 1. humor 2. happiness 3. Love Two Truths and a Lie 1. im a leo 2. you will never know everything there is to know about me 3. i love being stabbed in the back Three Physical Things About the Opposite Sex That Appeal to You 1. eyes 2. A great smile 3. Chemistry Three Things You Just Can't Do 1. get up in the morning 2. stick up for myself 3. take down my pictures Three of your Favorite Hobbies 1. reading 2. shopping 3. dancing Three Things you Want to do Right Now 1. move out of this house 2. cuddle 3. be okay Three Careers You're Considering 1. financial planner 2. web designer 3. being a model (haha...ya.....) Three Places You Want to Go on Vacation 1. hawaii 2. chicago 3. not the farm Three Kid's Names 1. skylar 2. matthew 3. madison Three Things You Want to do Before you Die 1. move out of this house 2. get along with my mom for once 3. get married Three People Who Have to do this ill just copy melissa 1. Everyone reading this 2. Everyone reading this who thinks this does not applys to you 3. Everyone reading this who thinks this does not applys to you and wants to go to the next journal entry..ya i'm talking to you!! :)

my phone is reeeeeally starting to piss me off.
i think im gonna take it in like on tuesday (or wednesday, when i dont work) and see if i can swap it out. cause i cant get the damn thing to charge, and it loves to just randomly shut off and not tell anyone. oh well i guess...
i want something new!! something shiny...or some kind of project... i know that i just bought a new head unit...but still... its not here yet. so i have nothing fun to play with :( i wrote em an email to see when theyre gonna ship it out... so im waiting for that. 

i got back to school tomorrow...joy. mmmm nope. and will i go to my math class...mmm prolly not. oooooh well. i have a test coming up, i should prolly start the review packet. theres sooo much to do, and i did none of it over the break.

katy bell is coming home this week. that makes me happy. i really miss her.

mmm i guess thats it for now.

ciao!

god! get me out of this house, right now!
i cant stand living here anymore. i hate talking to my mom about where im going to school next year cause all we end up doing is fighting over it. who gives a fuck if i dont want to go back to MSU next year. fuck her!

not too much has been going on. ive been seeing adam everyday. yesterday we both had work and then went home and each took naps, at like 730 he came and got me, and we went to best buy where i got a movie and some collectors pack of Mad About You. we also talked to a guy over in the car audio section about the new head unit that i got. after that we went to red robin for "dinner"/dessert. melissa was working there so she came and sat with us for a little while. and we kinda sorta talked about the place that she found in canton for us. we're going to try and set up an appointment with the guy soon. at like 1030ish we left there and went to meijer to get me a new razor. and then we went back to my house and watched mad about you.

right now im waiting for him to come pick me up. we have to go to gifis cause i left my bracelet there yesterday, and then we're goign to rams horn for lunch, and then probably back here to do biology... or maybe to his his house cause i hate my mom. 

well whatever. im out for now.
so im looking to get a second job so i can move out this summer. does anyone have any openings at their job??

so im taking a break from re-doing my room (again). my dad went ahead and broght home these huge desks from work, that they dont use anymore and put the two basement desktops on em in the basement, meaning that i got my big desk back that i never really got to use in the first place. it figures that i get my room just the way that i like it and then they go ahead and throw this curve ball at me. so im currently re-arranging everything all over again. i have to move my van goghs around and dust and all that bullshit...and re-hook up everything that goes to my computer blah!! this was all supposed to be done yesterday but i didnt do it so i got bitched out on the phone by my mom at work last night. so she better be fucking happy. my brother and i moved this stupid desk up here by ourselves...it was the most complicated thing that i think ive ever done.

i would love to travel. go anywhere in the world. just get away from livonia for a while. im most definitely going somewhere this summer, i dont care if its by myself or with some friends or what. but im going somewhere. any suggestions??

well i should get back to putting this room back together. 
adios!

i hate that i cant turn back the clock...
regret is a bitch.

















<small>im not a whore</small>

+ok so yay!
+i just bought myself a present!! and it only cost me like $200!!!
+i got my quarterly bonus yesterday at work, awesome! it was like $200, we got 81 cents as our payout, meaning you multiply .81 by the number of hours that you worked during that quarter to get ur bonus amount. (not that you really care, lol, but it makes me happy)
+i should probably start cleaning my room and stuff...eee...i dont want to. my sister should have to help...but no!! damn.





the pudgy bunnies on tv make me smile.

If you took the $160,000 you would spend on college and spent it on condoms ($.83 each), you could have sex 132 times a day, or 5.5 times an hour.  If that sounds excessive, you could have sex 3 times a day, buy a keg per day (for entertainment), a Cadillac Escalade, and still have $11.85 left over for weed every day for 4 years...what the hell are we doing here???????????

congradulate me...
i paid off two of my credit cards today...
my Victoria's Secret Card and my Amaco Gas Card
now im down to my Visa and my Best Buy (which my mom is helping me pay off)
so yay for me!!!


i feel great today.




and on top of all that, i think that later (if i can ever get all this stuff done, im gonna go to the rec center and buy a year long pass

had a pretty shitty day (the 17th).
i didnt go to math even tho i shouldve. i should have went and gotten my test. but nope! i didnt. damn me! well i got up for biology and went, took forever to find a parking spot...and i ended up getting one on like the opposite side of the parking lot that i wanted to be in, in the center lot. so i get to biology and i had an okay time in there. i got my test back that i took last week and i got an 80% on it, and i got an 81% on the quiz that i took yesterday. everyone that i saw today really liked my hair tho...so thats a plus...

anyways after biology i went home and got really bored, so i decided that i would go for a little run, cause i havent been running since like the spring when vitaly and i went... anyways so i get all dressed for the weather, it was so damn cold out. annnnyways, so i run up to the elementary school thats in my neighborhood and on the way back (over on meadowlark (i think thats the street)) im running, im running, putting one foot in front of the other...and BOOM! i put my foot down and my whole fucking knee gives out...WHAT THE HELL!? so i walk the rest of the way home in a hell of a lot of pain. i get home and collapse on the bed, and then decide to stop feeling sorry for myself and got my ass out of bed and into the shower. and then back into bed. and then instead of calling into work, i go. and then i get there, and the new girl wont stop staring at me. i was like mmmk... so everything that she says to me is a compliment. and i get kind of suspicious that the managers told her to be nice to me, so i ask adam to ask debbie what was going on, because it was making me kind of uncomfertable (if she was just being nice to me, and just faking it...fuck that) so adam asked debbie and she said that she would never get involved between two of her workers like that, but that jennifer would...(hint hint). so now im pissed and pretty hurt...i guess that what happened is that im "not the easiest person to get along with" so to get on my good side shes complimenting me. she complimented me on my hair, my earrings, my necklace, even my work pants..."i really like your pants, where did you get them?" wth!? and those were the only things that she said to me all day.

i feel like the whole world is against me. i wish it was summer and my friends were back in livonia, i feel so stuck.
hopefully, tomorrow...ill just be drunk, and all this will go away for awhile...


if a lightening bolt struck me down right now i wouldnt be the slightest bit upset, unless i lived.

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love -- anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realize read your LJ) have to say.


Lets make this interesting. Ready, go!

did another layout change... nothing exciting, just a giant martini... i love laying in bed after a shower just with a towel wrapped around me, theres something about it thats just really relaxing. and thats exactly what i need right now. just to relax, id go into more details but then i might be running my mouth and some people just really hate that about me. its time for a change with my body. im sick of the way that it looks. i dont want to gain any weight, cause i did that already and nothing good came from it, so i think that im gonna try to lose weight or turn my fat into muscle. vitaly is on this new whim right now about gaining weight, hes been drinking these protein shakes and hes been working out, and has inspired me to take care of my body, not to necessacerily (sp?) lose weight, but to keep it healthy, and healthy looking. i went out for a run today, and fucked up my knee pretty bad. it totally gave out on me, so i had to walk the rest of the way. damn my knees! my biology lab went pretty well today we were dealing with beetle larvae and we thought that we killed all of them...but luckily they didnt, they just panicked a lot and went into shock and then froze...lol. the girl that was in my group with anthony and adam and i said that she thought that they put them into bottles of tequilla, i hope not! eeee.... i could go for a bottle of tequilla and a tiny glass right about now

ok, so today i went and got my hair chopped off...and i have pictures....
Before ...and After
dont mind the chunkiness of my body in the second one, i think that my shirt is all funny positioned... oh well. i think that im gonna go running tonight to get rid of all this pent up stress, and maybe do a nice 10 min ab workout, sounds fun right?? el.fin.

fuck all these nightmares that ive been having...seriously.


















<small>oh! and um.... yeah. nevermind, i cant think of the words that express what im feeling..."lost" maybe??</small>

im really sick of people saying how much they hate valentines day. fucking get over it, its a holiday and theres not a god damn thing that you can do to change it. so what if youre not in a relationship! im sure that there are a million other people in the world that arent in relationships either, and you want everyone to feel sorry for your ass right? you want all your friends that have boyfriends/girlfriends to come rushing to your side and make you feel better. theres no reason that you should feel more alone on valentine's day, because the same couples that you see on valentines day are exactly the same couples that you see every other day of the year. you can cirticize me all you want, but then well...fuck you.
♥ ♥ ♥
edit: kerriann left a comment and this is my response to it: i thought that i would just add it along with this entry its not even that its hallmark, its just the fact that people over exaggerate every fucking little detail, and put themselves into this stupid little depression over something thats "present" every day of their lives, and they pick valentine's day to ruin everyone's fun and make people feel bad for them...fuck that!
♥ ♥ ♥

~karasamm2~

ah yes, so it is that time again...updating the journal when i should be doing homework...or sleeping.

i was so sick last night. i threw up constantly, and then again all day today, it really sucked. but ya, i should be doing some homework. i just got done with my math homework. and i <u>really really really</u> need to work on my philosophy. i didnt do so hot on the test that i took tonight. 

<lj-cut text="random talk about my life, that no one cares about">i have work tomorrow at 2pm and i really dont want to work it, i think im gonna call my cousin to see if he'll take my shift. he really owes me. i always take his shifts, anyways on wednesday i have a bio test. eee...not really ready for that either. and i need to find time to take my business exam too. i think that ill try to take that by the end of the week, and on top of that ill turn in the second "take home" exam.

im starting to break out on my face...why? i thought that i was over this stage in my life. guess not.
</lj-cut>

im getting to that point in the semester where i dont want to do anything; i dont want to go to class, i dont want to do the homework, i dont want to put in any effort. i have so much to do with absolutely noooo motivation. i feel stuck....
<center>right here
--->*<---
